data.title: Start Round Outside B Main Tether for Control
data.description: Here's a strong Seize lineup you can combo with, for start round control of B Main.

data.title: Front A Site Retake Haunt From Sreens
data.description: Here's a simple, yet effective Haunt lineup to retake the A Site, it clears Hell and front site.

data.title: Start Round A Main Info Haunt From Rafters
data.description: Here's a great Haunt lineup to use to grab fast A Main information, Attackers will have a hard time shooting it.
